title: Concussions with Leonard Marshall
description:
How is CTE different from a concussion?  Neil deGrasse Tyson and co-hosts Chuck Nice and Gary O’Reilly discuss concussions and chronic traumatic encephalopathy, with former NFL lineman, Leonard Marshall, and neuroscientist, Heather Berlin, PhD.

NOTE: StarTalk+ Patrons can watch or listen to this entire episode commercial-free.

Thanks to our Patrons Walter Johnson, Ali AlWaheedy, Armen Gevorgyan, Jenny K Leasure, WIGwigWIG, Denny, MaKayla A Holloway, Anna Dupre-Whiting, Allain Brideau, and David for supporting us this week.

Photo Credit: Garpenholm, CC BY-SA 3.0, via Wikimedia Commons
author: feed@startalkradio.net (Neil deGrasse Tyson, Chuck Nice, Gary O'Reilly, Leonard Marshall, Heather Berlin)
